item.title: Trump Says 'We'll Be Selling' F-35 Jets To Saudi Arabia, Ahead Of Crown Prince's White House Visit

item.title: Andrew Ng Says Most Productive Engineers Are 'Really On Top Of AI' — Here's Who's Falling Behind

item.title: Tesla Rival Xpeng To Release 3 Robotaxi Models, Says Technology Does Not Depend On LiDAR — Optimus Rival IRON Could Be A 'Tour Guide'
item.description: Xpeng plans to launch 3 new Robotaxi models in 2026, offer licensing opportunities, and use humanoid robot 'IRON' as a tour guide. read more
